skill.name: The Arclight Blade
skill.desc: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing magic damage to all enemies within.

skill.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
skill.desc: Amumu’s rage explodes, dealing magic damage to enemies within some Hexes, and stunning them.

skill.name: Tibbers!
skill.desc: Annie summons Tibbers near her target, dealing magic damage to all adjacent enemies. Tibbers fights for the rest of combat, dealing magic damage with each attack.

skill.name: Ranger's Focus
skill.desc: For 5 seconds, Ashe gains % Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows dealing physical damage.

skill.name: Arise!
skill.desc: Azir summons a Sand Soldier at the chosen location that lasts 6 seconds. Sand Soldiers attack nearby enemies whenever Azir attacks, dealing magic damage in a line.

skill.name: Pyroclasm
skill.desc: Brand launches a bouncing fireball at an enemy. This fireball will bounce to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage each time it hits.

skill.name: Unbreakable
skill.desc: Braum puts up his shield for 4 seconds, absorbing and stopping all incoming missiles and reducing his damage taken from that direction.

skill.name: Flame Cascade
skill.desc: Diana creates 3 flame orbs rotating around her which explode when they collide with an enemy. dealing magic damage. In addition, Diana shields herself for 4 seconds, absorbing the next damage she would take.

skill.name: Adrenaline Rush
skill.desc: Dr. Mundo creates a toxic cloud around him for 8seconds, dealing damage + 125% his maximum health as magic damage to nearby enemies each second and healing for % that value.

skill.name: Ice Shot
skill.desc: Ezreal fires a shard of ice at the lowest HP unit, dealing magic damage and applying on-hits.

skill.name: Triggerseed
skill.desc: Ivern shields the lowest health ally for 5 secondes, preventing the next damage.

skill.name: Monsoon
skill.desc: Janna summons a Monsoon, healing all allies in the area for % of their max health over 3 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked back and stunned for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Counter Strike
skill.desc: Jax dodges all incoming attacks for 2 seconds, then strikes all nearby units, dealing damage and stunning them for 1.5 second.

skill.name: Dawnbringer
skill.desc: At the start of combat, Karma tethers to her closest ally. Karma shields the tethered ally (or a random one if the tether is dead) for 5 seconds, absorbing the next damage. While the shield holds, the ally receives bonus Attack Speed.

skill.name: Arid Assault
skill.desc: Kha’zix stealths and attacks the lowest health enemy, critically striking damage and gaining 5 mana.

skill.name: Dance of Dread
skill.desc: Wolf mauls Kindred's target, dealing magic damage and reducing healing by 80% to her target for 5 seconds., while Lamb leaps away from Kindred's target.

skill.name: Living Artillery
skill.desc: Kog'Maw launches an artillery shot at a random enemy, dealing magic damage on impact

skill.name: Ethereal Chains
skill.desc: Leblanc launches an ethereal chain towards a random enemy, deals damage and stuns them for 1 second after a short delay.

skill.name: Lunar Eclipse
skill.desc: Leona reduces all damage done to her for 4 seconds.

skill.name: The Culling
skill.desc: Lucian fires 12 + (4X his attacks per second) bullets in a direction over 4 seconds, each dealing % of his Attack Damage, applying on-hits, and dealing additional magic damage.

skill.name: Final Spark
skill.desc: Lux fires an elemental blast dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. If Final Spark kills a unit, Lux is refunded 50 mana.

skill.name: Unstoppable Force
skill.desc: Malphite charges to a random enemy, dealing damage to and knocking all nearby enemies into the air, stunning them for a seconds.

skill.name: Shadow Swarm
skill.desc: Malzahar creates a shadow portal, summoning 2 Shadow Spawn. The Shadow Spawn hit for magic damage each attack. Shadow Spawn benefit from active Shadow trait bonuses.

skill.name: Sap Magic
skill.desc: After being damaged by an enemy spell, Maokai's next attack heals him.

skill.name: Meditate
skill.desc: Master Yi meditates, becoming untargetable for 1 second, healing 30% of his max health over the duration. For 6 seconds after he finishes meditating, Master Yi gains 100% attack speed and deals bonus magic damage on hit.

skill.name: Tidal Wave
skill.desc: Nami summons a massive tidal wave which deals damage to all enemies hit, knocking up and stunning them for a seconds. Allies hit are empowered, and their basic attacks deal an additional magic damage for the next 8 seconds.

skill.name: Fury of the Dawn
skill.desc: Nasus surrounds himself in light for 7 seconds, gaining maximun health and dealing damage to adjacent enemies every second.

skill.name: Depth Charge
skill.desc: Nautilus sends out a Depth Charge that seeks out an enemy, knocking them up and stunning them for a seconds. It also deals damage to all enemies it passes through.

skill.name: Blooming Burst
skill.desc: Neeko throws a seed at a random target, exploding three times with increasing radius, dealing to all enemies hit by each explosion.

skill.name: Steel Blades
skill.desc: Every three hits Nocturne's attack is enhanced, dealing damage and applying On Hit effects to all adjacent units, and healing % of damage dealt.

skill.name: Ragnarok
skill.desc: Olaf gains % Attack Speed, up to 50% Lifesteal based on missing health, and immunity to Crowd Control for the rest of the combat.

skill.name: Lightning Breath
skill.desc: Ornn breathes lightning in a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, and increasing their chance to be critically struck by 25% for the next 10 seconds.

skill.name: Elemental Blade
skill.desc: Qiyana blasts the two hexes in front of her, stunning enemies for several seconds and dealing magic damage.

skill.name: Furious Bite
skill.desc: Rek'Sai bites an enemy, dealing true damage.

skill.name: Cull the Meek
skill.desc: Renekton swings his blade, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself per enemy hit.

skill.name: Piercing Darkness
skill.desc: Senna fires a beam through her furthest ally, dealing magic damage to enemies, and buffing allies' on-hits for 5 seconds to deal magic damage from Senna.

skill.name: Poison Trail
skill.desc: Singed leaves a toxic cloud wherever he moves, poisoning enemies that stand in it to take damage over 6 seconds.

skill.name: Decimating Smash
skill.desc: Sion winds up for a moment, then smashes his axe down in a direction, dealing damage to and knocking up all enemies hit.

skill.name: Ricochet
skill.desc: For the next 5 seconds, Sivir's attacks bounce, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and applying On Hit effects.

skill.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
skill.desc: Skarner is shielded for damage for 8 seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains % attack speed.

skill.name: Equinox
skill.desc: Soraka calms the area around a random enemy, dealing to all enemies standing in the area and preventing them from gaining mana. After a while the area dissipates.

skill.name: Hydro Sphere
skill.desc: Syndra conjures a sphere of water near a random enemy which explodes, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

skill.name: Seismic Shove
skill.desc: Taliyah causes the ground to erupt under the enemy with the most mana, dealing magic damage to them and knocking them for 2 seconds towards her if they are ranged, or away from her if they are melee.

skill.name: Cosmic Radiance
skill.desc: After a 1.5 second delay, pulses cosmic energy onto allied champions within some hexes, making them invulnerable for a seconds.

skill.name: Deep Sea Lantern
skill.desc: Thresh throws his lantern to the lowest health ally, shielding them and nearby allies damage for 5 seconds.

skill.name: Spray and Pray
skill.desc: Twitch gains infinite range and deals for 8 seconds. During this time his attacks travel their full range and hit every enemy they pass through. This can also trigger On-Hit effects.

skill.name: Piercing Arrow
skill.desc: Varus channels for 1.5 seconds, then fires a piercing arrow, dealing magic damage to all enemies in its path.

skill.name: Silver Bolts
skill.desc: Whenever Vayne Basic Attacks the same target 3 times, she deals % of her target's Maximum Health as true damage.

skill.name: Primordial Burst
skill.desc: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy, dealing magic damage. If Veigar is a higher star level than his target, this damage is incresed to 19999.

skill.name: Drain
skill.desc: Vladimir deals magic damage to the target and heals for the same amount.

skill.name: Frenzied Bite
skill.desc: Volibear bites his target, dealing damage. If the target is below 35% health, Frenzied Bite kills the target and restores Volibear's mana to full.

skill.name: Infinite Duress
skill.desc: Warwick pounces on the weakest enemy, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and striking them 3 times, dealing magic damage. Each strike triggers on-hit effects and heals Warwick for 100% of the damage dealt.

skill.name: Last Breath
skill.desc: Yasuo blinks to the enemy with the most items and knocks them up, holding them airborn for 1 second and hitting them 3 times, dealing basic attack damage and applying On Hit effects.

skill.name: Shepherd of Souls
skill.desc: Yorick blesses his lowest health allies except Minions of Light. When they die they are resurrected as a Minion of Light with several health and attack damage.

skill.name: Living Lightning
skill.desc: Zed creates an identical clone of himself behind his current target. This clone can also cast Living Lightning, and inherits Zed's items, stats, and current health.

skill.name: Rampant Growth
skill.desc: Zyra summons Flame Spitters at a random location at the edge of the arena. The Flame spitters attack the nearest enemy for 3 seconds. dealing magic damage per attack a total of 4 times.
